lead_paragraph: With a third Tour de France title virtually secured on Saturday, Britain's Chris Froome quickly set his sights toward more glory on the French roads via Rio de Janeiro.

headline.print_headline: Chris Froome Setting Sights on Rio and More Tour Glory
headline.main: Chris Froome Setting Sights on Rio and More Tour Glory

snippet: With a third Tour de France title virtually secured on Saturday, Britain's Chris Froome quickly set his sights toward more glory on the French roads via Rio de Janeiro....
